title: Zomato is getting pathetic day by day!
selftext:
Today I ordered Burgers and fries from a restaurant on Zomato and the order was late. Got a "claim your late coupon" prompt which was a puny 73₹ whereas order amount was 329₹. 

Point is not to get a refund but to get connected with customer support to resolve the issue. Lately, Zomato just redirects any issue to email and does not let you get to chat support. This is really pathetic and transforms into a frustrating user experience. 

Not to mention their artificially inflated prices and ridiculously high "packing charges". Have been a Zomato Gold member since they first started it but now I don't think it's worth renewing anymore.
